text:
- My name is Ariane Morin,
Senior Engagement Manager at AWS.
(upbeat music)
As an engagement manager,

I really work on building
relationships with customers
to enable delivery of our engagements.
We wanna make sure that we are helping

and supporting the customer
through their Cloud journey
by offering them services

that will really make
them grow for the Cloud.
I come from technology background.
It was a few years I was telling myself
the Cloud is where everyone is going,

and for me, working for AWS was
being a part of that future.
If you're thinking about joining AWS,

read the leadership
principles to start with.
See if you recognize yourselves.

See if they actually make
you excited or not to read.
If not, then I think you can stop there.
If yes, then you can dig in, you know?

Then make sure that you
prepare well for the interview

and that you have tons of
examples that actually show

how you embody those
leadership principles.
(upbeat music)
